chapters.title: Chapter 34: Drifting
chapters.info: Faeldrin Harella, p. 573—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She grew up in Tarabon. She has dark hair that she usually keeps in thin braids. She later became an apprentice of the Wise Ones. She was killed by Hessalam, who also killed Kiruna and Vitalien and took Sarene captive with Compulsion. She took Flinn's arm at the same time.
